text: "Nad Tatrou sa blÃ½ska" (, meaning "Lightning O'er the Tatras") is the national anthem of Slovakia. When Slovakia, along with Czechia, was part of the former country of Czechoslovakia, parts of this anthem was played along the Czech national anthem "Kde domov mÅ¯j". The words of the song were written in 1844 by Janko MatÃºÅ¡ka, and the melody of the song comes from a Slovak folk song called "Kopala studienku". ==Lyrics== Only the first two stanzas are officially
